Omschrijf BelgianTeam/TranslationSprint-PackagingJam hier.

=== What? ===
We are looking for two groups of people who would like to help Ubuntu. Translators and Packagers.
* If you like to help translate Ubuntu into dutch you can come and help us.
* If you have some knowledge about Ubuntu and would like to learn about Packaging feel free to join us. More info: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MOTU/RunningPackagingJam

=== When? Where? ===
* saturday March 29 2008
* VOC
   A. Rodenbachstraat
  3500 Hasselt
  (Near the Virga Jesse Hospital)
=== Join us ===
Subscribe yourself in 1 of the 2 lists below. We need at least 5 translators and/or 5 packagers if we like this meeting to take place.
